00033 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORShaperShaperTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00034 {
00035   // check severity to improve speed
00036   if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00037     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): got one: "
00038                   << "cr-ca-ch-adc = " 
00039                   << fShaperShaperDecoder->CrateOf(record) << "-"
00040                   << fShaperShaperDecoder->CardOf(record) << "-" 
00041                   << fShaperShaperDecoder->ChannelOf(record) << "-" 
00042                   << fShaperShaperDecoder->ADCValueOf(record) << endl;
00043   }
00044 
00045   fCrate = fShaperShaperDecoder->CrateOf(record);
00046   fCard = fShaperShaperDecoder->CardOf(record);
00047   fChannel = fShaperShaperDecoder->ChannelOf(record);
00048   fADC = fShaperShaperDecoder->ADCValueOf(record);
00049 
00050   return kSuccess;
00051 }
